General.Name: Korfez Gayrimenkul Yatirim
General.Description: Körfez Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. develops and markets real estate projects in Turkey. The company is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Körfez Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Kuveyt Türk Katilim Bankasi A.S.
General.Address: Buyukdere Caddesi No: 129/1 K: 9, Istanbul, Turkey
